original_text: John said to Jesus, ‘Teacher, we saw a man who was causing bad spirits to go out of people. He was using your authority to do it. But he is not in our group. So we told him that he must not do it.’
korean_text: 요한이 예수께 여짜오되 선생님 우리를 따르지 않는 어떤 자가 주의 이름으로 귀신을 내쫓는 것을 우리가 보고 우리를 따르지 아니하므로 금하였나이다

sentences.original_text: who was causing bad spirits to go out of people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게서 나쁜 영들을 쫓아내고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He was using your authority to do it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신의 권위를 사용하여 그것을 하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: But he is not in our group
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 우리 그룹에 속하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: that he must not do it'
